column3: Bethlehem is a German metal band from Grevenbroich
column4: formed in 1991 by Jürgen Bartsch and Kläus Matton. Before starting Bethlehem
column5: Bartsch and Matton used to play in a German thrash metal band called Morbid Vision. Bethlehem are widely credited for inventing a whole new sub-genre of metal
column7: named after their first full length album. Many of their lyrics revolve around sickness
column11: and may to some extent be personal to the band.
